channel.title: indigenous knowledge systems on jay l. colbert
channel.description: Recent content in indigenous knowledge systems on jay l. colbert

item.title: 1b Not all knowledge systems will hear archival silences the same way
item.description: Not every culture, group, or community is going to have the same knowledge management, knowledge transmission, or knowledge organization systems as the dominant library/archival science framework. There are oral traditions of music transmission, there are Tibetan Buddhist practices that are only shared between lama and student in an unending lineage back to the Buddha, there are traditions where information is only shared within that group. parent 1 Archival silence is a problem when its purpose is oppression
